Find a girl, take her back to the meeting place with me, make her a slime and see who she wants to serve.” She said to herself. Admittedly it would be nice if the new slime-girl did want to serve her, but I would be pretty cool if Lindsey was “in control”. Soon enough, Jenny spotted a perfect candidate.


Lindsey went elsewhere for her “test”. She remembered how the dew and Jenny’s clothes made her grow, although the growth was barely noticeable. She needed something bigger and/or more nutritious to see if she’d really grow. Her search was cut sort. As she went through another alley next to a very tall building, she happened to be where a man had jumped from the top floor, attempting to commit suicide. Lindsey instinctively liquidized as she was hit and her body enveloped the jumper. ‘Oh, what a happy coincidence.’ She thought as she felt the man dissolve in her body. She felt amazing as the nutrients coursed through her body, she felt so good she almost had an orgasm. The growth felt just as good. As the man she engulfed was digested, his mass and volume were added to Lindsey’s, making her grow to about 9 feet tall if she kept her human form.


Lindsey was the first back to the alley she and Jenny agreed to meet in. Jenny returned not too long after, dragging along a terrified looking girl.

“Lin!? You’ve grown!” Jenny exclaimed.

“Yes I have. I’ll tell you about it in a bit. Who’s that?” Lindsey asked looking at Jenny’s captive.

“It’s Michelle Williams. She doesn’t really know us and we don’t really know her, so I thought she’d be the best one to help us determine an answer.” Jenny replied.

“A good choice. Well don’t mind me; you’d better get on with it.” Lindsey replied, stepping back to give Jenny room.


Jenny did what she remembered Lindsey doing. She kissed Michelle and absorbed her clothes. Michelle’s terrified expression quickly changed into one of pleasure as Jenny fed her arm into her pussy. With a quick scream and a release of sexual juices, Michelle collapsed into a puddle of blue slime.

Lindsey looked at her friend, she didn’t seem to grow like she had. Jenny had both Michelle’s cloths and cum to grow with, but they didn’t seem to do anything.

“That was amazing.” Jenny said breathlessly as she sat near Michelle’s puddle, “So, how did you grow?”

“Well I grew some, very little, from the dew on the grass this morning. And I bit more from your clothes. But I grew the most when a man jumped into me.” Lindsey explained.

“Do I look any different?” Jenny asked.

“No, I’m afraid not. It’s probably because I touched the original space-slime thing.” Lindsey replied.

“Oh well. You can’t win ‘em all.” Jenny sighed, “Oh hey, Michelle’s waking up.”


“Hey Michelle, how’s it going?” Jenny asked as Michelle sat up.

“F-fine I think.” Michelle replied, poking at her new blue body.

“Well, now you can help satisfy our curiosity. If either of us were to give you an order, which of us would you obey?” Jenny asked.

“I’m not sure why, but it would be Lindsey.” Michelle answered, pointing at Lindsey.

“Well, I guess that settles it, Lin.” Jenny said with a smile.

11121112121.content:
"As much as I'd like to grow some more, we need to keep things quiet for as long as possible," Lindsey explained. "When the world finds out about us, they'll probably react violently; I don't think bullets can hurt us like this, but what's to say something like a flamethrower or chemical weapons can't still hurt us? So we need to transform those who would be the first to notice our disappearance before anything else."

"What do you mean?" Michelle asked.

"Well, who would be the first people to notice we're missing?" Lindsey asked.

"Our former families," Jennifer replied.

"Exactly; so, we need to get them first. We'll each return to our homes, and transform our mothers and sisters, and eat our fathers and brothers," Lindsey explained. "When that's done, bring them and meet at my house tomorrow."

"So we need to bring everyone... Might be hard to keep all of us hidden, I come from a big family," Michelle explained. "In addition to my mother, I have three sisters, and my aunt lives with us too."

"Think we could use the sewer system to travel between houses without attracting attention?" Jennifer asked.

"Do you have a map of the pipes?" Michelle asked jokingly.

"Good point..." Jennifer sighed.

"Hmm... Well, why don't you come over before sunrise then? It'll be easier to sneak around in the dark," Lindsey said. "Anything else?"

"Just the goodbye kiss," Jennifer said before giving Lindsey a quick kiss.

"Alright, I'll see you two tomorrow!" Lindsey said before heading back home.

--- --- --- --- --- --- ---

Back at her house, Lindsey realized she was the only one home. While waiting for her parents to get home from their day jobs, she practiced shape shifting. At around five, she saw her father's car pull into the driveway, as it usually did at that time of day. It was then that the reality of what she was doing hit her.

I... I'm going to kill my own father... Is this really worth it? Lindsey began to inwardly debate herself. Transforming into a slime girl is completely changing my personality... I never would have killed anyone before. But... No! This is a good thing! We're the birth of a new species, one that will replace humanity, and bring in its own age of greatness! But ...Can I really go through with this?

The front door began to creak open, she had to make a decision now...

Lindsey sat in the living room, practicing her shape-shifting for about half an hour before she heard her mom’s car pulling in. “Well, it’s time to finish my part of the plan.” Lindsey said to herself as she carefully moved to a better position to transform her mother. She sat there with her legs spread apart, smiling with eager anticipation, as she heard the front door opening.

“Honey, Lindsey, I’m home.” Lindsey’s mom called out as she came inside and closed the front door.

“Hiya Mom.” Lindsey said as her mom turned the corner from the front hall to the living room.


Helen, Lindsey’s mom, nearly screamed when she saw what was in the living room. “L-L-Lindsey?” she stammered as the big slime-girl’s legs crossed behind her.

“Yeah Mom, it’s me. Weren’t expecting this when you got home did you?” Lindsey giggled.

“What happened, how did you get like this? Is there something I can do to get you back to normal?” Helen asked.

“I’ll explain how this happened later. If there is a way to get back to normal I don’t want to know what it is. Right now, there’s something I need to do.” Lindsey replied.

“Such as?” Helen asked, suddenly feeling nervous.

“Well, since you’re going to be part of it I may as well fill you in. Earlier this morning I changed Jenny, you know my best friend, into a slime-girl. And a little while later she changed Michelle into one, she’s that shy Latino girl we always parked behind when you used to drop me off at school. Anyway, the three of us decided we liked being like this, so to keep safe we decided to make sure our families didn’t notice we were missing, and as time went on we’d spread our good feelings.” Lindsey explained, nudging her mother closer with her foot.

“What happened to your dad?” Helen asked, her expression was both fearful and angry.

Even though she was bigger now, seeing her mother even slightly angry still unnerved Lindsey. “Uh… um… I’ll explain about Dad later. As for right now-” she said quickly before grabbing her mother and enveloping her in her slimy body.


“It’s going to be alright Mom. I’m not digesting you or anything like that. I’m just changing you into a slime-girl like I did with Jenny. Well not the same way I did with Jenny, but I doubt that’s a problem.” Lindsey said comfortingly, not letting it show that her mother’s kicks and struggles were arousing her. She smiled warmly as she felt her mom’s clothes dissolve into her and as she felt her mother’s body change into slime. Carefully Lindsey brought her mom’s new dark green body from hers and set her mom gently on the couch to rest. “Now all there is to do is wait for the girls.” Lindsey said to herself as she lay down to wait.

Michelle's surviving family looked at their ruler, gooey eyes wide and shiny. A couple of their mouths gaped as they followed her movements. Limdsey felt that she would have blushed had she still had any pigment. Wanting to fulfill the proper role of a host she went to her fridge. Stooping down, she peered inside and began to take out all the packaged food her family had frozen. Placing the frozen pile on the counter, she sliced open a pack of bacon, four chicken breasts, a couple of steaks, and a package of sausages. Lindsey smiled at her slimes, who beamed at the attention,

"Here's some food, I don't think it matters if we cook it anymore," Lindsey said. The eight or so relatives crowded around the kitchen table, stroking the streaks Lindsey's hands had left on the food. After a minute they began to place the cuts of meat inside where they quickly broke down. Just as the last chicken fizzed out of existence in an aunt a knock came at the door.

"Delivery!" A voice called from outside the door. Lindsey bounded for the front of the house, grinning at Jenny's introduction. She yanked open the door. Waiting on the doorstep was not Jenny, but a pizza man. He looked up at the tall slime girl, mouth open, pizza on the ground, arms straight out at his sides. His mouth opened and closed quickly while slight choking sounds came out of him.

"Uh-um, I have a delivery for Jenny?" He managed to squeak out, edging away from Lindsey. Just as he started to bolt Lindsey snagged him by the arm and pulled him inside. She slammed the door, hoping it would muffle some of the screaming. She pinned him down as he tried to get out of her grasp, her fingers rapidly burning through the uniform and leaving angry red marks on his skin. After a second's thought, Lindsey decided she had one option.

"Sorry buddy," Lindsey said. Then she leaned forward, completely enveloping the man. His screams gargled out of existence as she filled his mouth and covered him. Lindsey moaned as she stood up, stepping clumsily down the hallway. She stopped a few feet from the door and fell back against the wall, opposite the full-length mirror on a closet door. Inside her, she watched the delivery guy thrash as she digested the poor soul. Much of his clothes were gone, and layers of skin were starting to burn off. The sight took her breath away and she slid down the wall, barely able to keep her human shape. Her fingers teased her labia, jolting her body. Lindsey didn't have to go much farther, watching her victim die inside her was all the gratification she needed. It was hard to tell if he drowned first or simply died from the pain of being dissolved, but after four minutes the red cloud inside her was recognizable only by the skeleton. Lindsey still lay collapsed on the floor, panting.

Another knock at the door. Lindsey was almost too lost to notice, but then it came again. She rose to her feet, narrowly avoiding splashing her head on the ceiling. At her new height she barely fit in the hallways, the rooms would be far too low for her. She looked briefly out through the windows above the door, and confirmed this time that it was Jenny. Lindsey opened the door for her friend, who was greeted by a view of Lindsey's stomach, the last bits of a skull dissolving within.

"I see you received my appetizer your majesty," Jenny said, smiling broadly.

"That was so mean! He had no idea what was happening. I feel bad, Jenny. Why'd you do that?" Lindsey said, ushering her friend inside. Jenny frowned slightly.

"Bad? So did you not want all these guys to eat?"

"Of course, I was kidding. But seriously, he looked so shocked. Who'd you get?" Lindsey asked, gently poking the last few bone stubs floating inside her. Jenny grinned up at her.

"Three of your ex's, one of mine, and two random guys off the street," Lindsey reported, counting them off on her fingers. "They're in the back of this van I borrowed," Lindsey gestured to a small commercial van parked on Lindsey's driveway. "Where do you want them?"

"Bring them in and put them downstairs, they won't be bored for too long," Lindsey said, waving her hand dismissively. She looked briefly outside to make sure no one was around. Then she ducked outside and opened the rear door of the van. Five people cowered before the slime girl.

"Jenny, I thought you said there were six!" Lindsey said.

"Oh yeah. I got a little hungry on the way back. Only one random guy, my bad. Now come on, out of the van my little morsels." Jenny reached in and began pulling them out. Lindsey helped usher them inside, already hungry at the prospect of her feast.

Lindsey woke up on a table, surrounded by figures in yellow radiation suits. She screamed and jumped off the surgical table. Looking around, her mind took in the stainless steel testing room, the table surrounded by medical equipment, with glass walled balcony with several figures observing the room. The more immediate threat was the four yellow figures that had surrounded the table, and now trying to surround her. Lindsey sobbed, "Where am I? What do you want with me?"

A pinging sound came from a sound speaker in the wall, catching the attention of the yellow figures, as well as Lindsey. "Young lady, you were found at your residence with extremely high levels of radiation. We removed you to this site, a military bio-contamination research center. You are still producing a severe amount of radiation, possibly from contacting the meteorite in your yard. Can you tell us what you remember?”

Lindsey looked up, and saw what she believed to be a general in the upper window. She called out, “There was a slimy blob in the meteor. I touched it, and it grabbed my arm. That’s all I remember.”

One of the figures in the yellow radiation suits cleared his throat, and caught Lindsey’s attention. He questioned, “Listen Miss, uh…”

“Lindsey. Now, WHO ARE YOU?”

“Doctor Von Shout. I am head scientist with a PHD in nuclear science, and a Masters in Human Biology. Now, I realize this is all very strange to you, Lindsey, but I need you to get on the table, just so we can scan you. No probing, no needles, for now. We want to find out what caused you to faint and to emit the radiation.”

111333112.content:
Wait a minute; you feel the gel oozing under your skin. “Doctor, I think the goo is moving.” Looking down, you see some bumps moving along your arms. “See, there in my arms; it looks like sets of marbles rolling in my veins.”

The scientists crowd around your bed and look at your arms. The two orderlies claim that there is nothing visible, but Doctor Von Shout assures you that there are better ways to confirm it. Bringing in an electric microscope, he examines your arm again under varying magnifications. Doctor Von Shout announces, “It appears that the young miss was able to see what cannot be seen with the human eye. With an x100 magnification, it does appear that the parasitic goo is moving around in her veins, possibly using her cardiovascular system to reach all parts of her body in a record amount of time.”

From the observation deck, a big shot voice called out, “Are you saying that she is completely infected with that space bug?”

“It appears that the goo is well with her system. This could also explain her eye-sight; the goo has potential to enhance the host’s body in various ways. The height enhancements, the vision improvements—these are just the beginning.”

“If this is bug is inside her, then she needs to undergo further exams, and she needs to be quarantined—to prevent contamination of any more humans.” The official voice from the general catches the attention of everyone in both the laboratory room and the observational deck. “For the safety of everyone, strap her down, and sedate her. Run the tests you need to isolate the goo, and extract it. If you can remove it, we can let her get back to her life. However, if not, we will need to take her to more isolated facilities to perform more specific analysis on the purposes of the space bug.”

“Whoa, what are you saying?” Your head turned towards the orderlies, only to realize that they each had one of your arms pinned to the table. As the restraints were closed around your wrists, you tried to move off of the table. Pumping your feet against the table, you tried to break the metal restraints, but the restraints defy your pull. The orderlies strap your ankles to the table, and you lift your upper body into a slanted position with your elbows.

“I am sorry, my dear miss, but if we don’t do as the general says, he may call in the bio-contamination ‘death squad’ just to eradicate you and your little gooey friends. At least this way, you have a better chance of staying in one piece,” the yellow suited doctor moved towards you, holding out a needle.

If that needle got to your skin, you knew it was over. End of story. Bucking against the restraints, you lean as far away from the doctor as you possibly can. “No, you can’t do this to me! Stop!”

Everyone hears the clothing on your shoulder tear apart. A column of green space goo appears from the skin of your shoulder, and bends as a wave towards the figure of the doctor. Forming a blade-like appearance, the goo lashes out, catching the doctor off-guard. The slime splits the needle in two pieces, just above the doctor’s grip. As he stumbles backwards with his worthless tube, the goo, with the appearance of a geyser and the movements of a cobra, slides back towards your stomach. While it does not lash out at anyone else, it does not appear to grow or diminish in size. From the observational booth, the general’s voice shouts, “What is that thing? Restrain her now!!”

The slime column faces your arm and you look down at it as well. With your goop-enhanced hawk vision, you see that your skin cells are oozing of the slime, in a lighter green-yellow color. The gooey droplets collect together, and even more ooze out of your pores. You realize that it may be at least a minute before anyone sees that the arm is being coated in a thickening cast of the gooey substance.

The green space geyser from your shoulder perks up, and reforms itself into a blunt hammer. It lunges out, catching an orderly in the chest, and sending the person sailing into the wall. The orderly slumps against the wall, and this distraction was all the time that the goo needed to complete its cocoon.

The doctor and analyst shout out, and point at your arm. Your arm, human just seconds ago, is now coated from the elbow down in green-yellow slime. It starts at a paper thin layer, changing your skin from Caucasian to Yellow, but the gooey cast grows to thicker and thicker proportions, covering up the restraint, and blurring the appearance of your arm.

Looking from your left to your right, you see that both of your arms are now covered in the thick goo, making it appear as if you have rolled-up sleeping bags wrapped around your lower arms. Within the cast, you try to move your arm, and you raise both of the casts off of the table, to the surprise and horror of the doctors and the observers above. Lying back down on the table, you can see that the cast is slowly moving up your arms, shifting from below your elbow, and moving the cast to your upper arm. Your fingers are exposed at the bottom, and the doctor tries to take photos of your transformation from a safe distance. The fingers are almost five times bigger than they were before, and the palm of your hand is big enough to wrap around the whole human chest. The cast has shifted visibly to your upper arms now, and you feel a mixture of muscle and bone growth, causing spasms of pain. You arch your back, and scream out now, as the upper arm enhancements seem to cause much more pain than the hand and lower arm adjustments.

“What is going on down there, doctor?! What is that thing doing to the victim?”

Doctor Von Shout struggles between taking video recordings, measurement observations, and explaining what he believes the space slime is doing. He cries out, “It is enhancing her growth rate. From the overall 4 inches of growth from first exposure to now, the goo is manipulating her growth rate to x5 the proportional size of the human body. The goo produced a nutrient rich environment from itself, to enhance the development of her body for self-preservation. As a result, she is suffering from both sudden growth plate changes in her bones and the stretching and development of her muscle tissues. The fact that she has stayed in one piece is remarkable.” The doctor continues to take photos of the slime’s progress.

Meanwhile, the slimy substance had produced casts around both of your feet now. The casts allowed the feet to float in a bubble-tube of goop. You don’t feel the restraints around your ankles. For kicks, you roll off the table, and drop to the floor. The goo flattens out around your feet, before it thickens again and covers over your feet. Before too long, the goo shifts up your thighs and exposes your feet and ankles. The same expansion rate occurred down below, and you feel the same strained expansion rush through the muscles in your thighs. Your legs are aching, and you sit back on the table. “Oh, that really burns,” you groan. You flex your fingers and your toes, feeling the sensation of the floor, all tingling with the mix of open nerves and fresh skin. Out of the corner of your eye, you notice the pieces of metal sticking out of the table where the restraints had been. Looking at your hands, you see full bracelets of metal sticking out of your expanded skin.

Doctor Von Shout waves his arms at you. “Miss Lindsey, you need to lie down on the table.” He approaches you with his hands empty, and you look at him. A few weeks later, Narytiss takes control
A few weeks later, Narytiss has miscalculated
1312.content:
“I’m in the basic area of your chest, specifically in the ribcage and in front of your heart and lungs.” Narytiss replied.

Ignoring the urge to faint Lindsey almost literally tore off her shirt and fearfully looked for where the alien woman may have entered her body, but she saw no scar or any sigh that the skin had been pierced.

“Seamless huh?” Narytiss said proudly, reading Lindsey’s thoughts, “Although I am a bit surprised, it usually takes several days before the entry wound heals and the scar disappears.”

“Wait, what do you mean ‘usually’?” Lindsey asked, nervously wondering what could be wrong.

“My species form symbiotic bonds with other species in order to survive in hostile environments. For example here the composition of your planet’s atmosphere combined with the frequency of your sun’s light waves would have caused my flesh to dissolve; fortunately it was nighttime when I crashed so the rays reflected by your moon were vastly less damaging. A few day in you and I’ll be healthier than I’ve ever been in my life. But I digress, it would seem that your species and mine are on a similar evolutionary path, making it simple to form a bond. And it would seem that the waste materials in our respective bloodstreams are beneficial to the other. You’re the perfect environment for me.” Narytiss explained.

“Wait, so you’re saying that the stuff that’s bad in your blood is good stuff for my blood?” Lindsey asked.

“That is correct.” Narytiss said before Lindsey felt another mind probe, “A few weeks together and you’d have the body of one of your super-models and be one of the healthiest being on your planet.”

Lindsey was quite keen on that idea. “Well, I guess we can do this symbiosis thing for a while.”


What Lindsey didn’t know was what Narytiss had planned. The alien knew of another side effect of their bond that she kept hidden from her host. The nourishment she would absorb would cause her to grow, and in turn would cause Lindsey to grow to accommodate her. But Narytiss knew a way to surpress the growth for a time; if she calculated everything correctly it would be enough time to find a way to bring control over the human’s body. And then, the fun would begin.
1312.title: In your chest

choices: “… a punishment” (Narytiss is a traitor/criminal)
“… part of a “Boarder expansion” campaign” (Narytiss is a scout/soldie
13122.content:
After a brief moment or two of struggling Lindsey finally managed to get her pants on.
In the few weeks that Narytiss has taken refuge inside of her body, Lindsey had grown at an incredible pace. Her old bras were now useless, too small to cover her new bust. Her pants were difficult to pull up over her new, full, hips and ass; and were always tight on her when they were on. She stepped to the mirror to brush her hair, and lost balance, not use to be 6'3". "Nary...how long are you gonna stay in me...I mean, I like my new body and all, but I'm starting to get a little bit too big here..." Lindsey said.

Narytiss, inside Lindsey's body, had grown to 3 times her original size. Her body had fused with much of Lindsey's, but Lindsey didn't know this yet. "Oh, just another day or so. I gotta make sure I'm fully healed." She said. Narytiss, though, was really trying to hijack Lindsey's body completely, and today was the day. Narytiss had been waiting patiently for Lindsey to leave her house and head somewhere private, but she was taking her sweet time. Suck it up Nary, you need just a few more hours to ensure success. Besides, the wait makes the rewards that much sweeter. Narytiss thought to herself, making sure her mind was blocked from Lindsey’s.


Lindsey went out to the mall that morning to look for clothes that fit her better and to show her body off. She’d come to enjoy the lust-filled stares of men, the envious glares of women, and both from the occasional lesbian over the past few weeks.

The shopping center… not quite what I had in mind. Narytiss thought, Lindsey’s trip was unexpected, but Narytiss always prided herself in being flexible in her plans.


Hours later Lindsey was washing her hands at the sink in the ladies room, Narytiss couldn’t use everything, and was the only one there.

It’s show time. Narytiss thought excitedly, and began taking control.

Lindsey gasped. Narytiss did too. "Nary...what...what are you doing..." Lindsey asked grabbing the sink to keep herself steady.

"Stop... resisting..." Narytiss said.

"I'm...what? Stop it!" Lindsey said, feeling Narytiss' thoughts fill her mind. "What are you doing, stop, I'm already too tall!" Lindsey as her height inched upward.

Lindsey and Narytiss suddenly both had access to Lindsey's senses. Lindsey looked down, and was shocked, seeing the skin of Narytiss' skin color overtaking hers. Lindsey looked up in the mirror, and watched her eyes start to glow a light green (a combination of Lindsey's green eyes, and Narytiss' glowing white eyes. Lindsey watched as her body continued to inch upward. Lindsey's hair lengthened down her body, and had streaks of both Narytiss' hair color, and Lindsey's. Her clothes felt ready to burst and fall to the ground as Lindsey passed 6'7" in height. "Nary, what's going on!?"

Lindsey's facial features slowly began to shift into Narytiss', her body altered and shifted. The transformation stopped. Lindsey was still mostly human, except with bluish green skin color, glowing green eyes fill with bioluminescence. Her ears were slightly pointer, and her body stopped growing at 6'10, at least for now. Then her muscles seized, releasing her grip on the sink and forcing her to the tiled floor where she blacked out.


A short while later Lindsey’s eyes opened but Lindsey wasn’t the one opening them. “I was hoping you’d put up more challenge than that.” Narytiss said with Lindsey’s mouth. Lindsey could see through her own eyes and felt her mouth move, and felt her muscles moving as her changed body stood up, but nothing moved when she wanted it to.

What’s happening, why can’t I- YOU! You bitch! I trusted you, and in return you take my body from me?! Lindsey thought, unable to say anything.

“Yeah, pretty much. In all truthfulness I’ve done a bit of lying to you since I landed. Your atmosphere isn’t harmful to me or my species, and despite what it seemed I didn’t come here by accident.” Narytiss replied verbally, as though to mock Lindsey.

Why are you here then? Lindsey asked timidly?

Narytiss smiled, “I was sent here, by the queen of my planet no less, as…”
13122.title: A few weeks later, Narytiss takes control

choices: Dozens of alien ships over major cities (typical invasion)
A few ships landing in secluded areas (more like colonization)
131222.content:
“Boarder expansion?” You mean an invasion! Lindsey thought, though frightened by this revelation her outrage at being used was still great.

“You get right to the point, don’t you? Yes it’s pretty much going to be an invasion. For the heck of it I’ll show you what it might be like.” Narytiss said. In a moment images flashed into Lindsey’s mind, images of…
131222.title: “… part of a “Boarder expansi...

choices: Narytiss waits for the troops to arrive
Narytiss decides to have some fun
1312221.content:
Lindsey would have shaken her head in shock if she could control it. As the final image of Narytiss’ people emerging from a craft faded away a glimmer of hope came to her. All those soldiers were the same size you were. Humanity isn’t going to bow down to tiny things like you! She thought triumphantly.

“Whoever said we all would be tiny?” Narytiss asked. Lindsey almost literally felt her hopes die as Narytiss continued, “True most of us would be tiny, but there will be those like me who will form our symbiotic bonds and take over your bodies. Now you’re probably thinking ‘A few of you in human bodies won’t do much good’ right?” Narytiss giggled, knowing what Lindsey was really thinking, “If so you’d be wrong. One thing I never told you was that our bond would cause the both of us to grow to, oh about 100 feet or so, using your measurements. With a few more like me, conquering your world will be quite simple.”

A hundred-! But, why didn’t we grow? Lindsey asked.

“Because I kept us from growing until I was in control. And now that I am…” Narytiss replied before going silent, smiling ecstatically.

Though she could control her body, Lindsey still felt the tingling as the growth started. She felt her clothes become tighter and tighter before finally they burst into shreds. “Feels good doesn’t it?” Narytiss asked before they broke through to restroom ceiling. The small flash of pain from breaking the ceiling disappeared quickly as the pleasurable tingling grew strong as Narytiss grew bigger. Lindsey heard the screams of people seeing Narytiss grow, and felt Narytiss’ cruel pleasure of hear those screams. Within minutes Narytiss stood at the 100 feet she promised. “Your world looks quite different from up here, doesn’t it?” Narytiss giggled.
1312221.title: Dozens of alien ships over major cities (typica...

choices: Lindsey gains her freedom when the fleet comes and friends/family are rewarded.
The fleet arrives quite late, Narytiss panics when she finds out the reason why.
13122211.content:
Lindsey enthusiastically agreed with Narytiss. When you're around 100 feet tall, the view really is spectacular. Satisfied that she now totally controls Lindsey's body, Narytiss decides to take a walk in the countryside. Before leaving she remembers to pick up the now very tiny bag of clothing that Lindsey had bought that day. She knows that without food from her home world she can't maintain her current height for very long. Not that she would tell Lindsey about this weakness. So once she's out of sight of everyone, Narytiss starts allowing Lindsey's body to return to its previous size.

Lindsey really liked being a giantess so when Narytiss said, "It's time I returned to your former size." Lindsey panics. She thinks that Narytiss will completely return to her original height and fairly flat chest when Lindsey first found her a few weeks ago. She doesn't realize that Narytiss meant her recent height of 6' 3", not her original height over a foot shorter. So as their blended body shrinks Lindsey starts chanting to herself over and over EVERYTHING FOUR INCHES BIGGER. She figures that being almost 5' 6" tall wouldn't be all that short and if anybody asks her how come she's suddenly a foot shorter Lindsey would say (with Narytiss permission) that she grew so fast, she popped. Which would probably get some interesting expressions from her friends or others.

It took Narytiss a much longer time to shrink her NEW body then it did for her to grow. Because Lindsey was already taller than over 99.9% of women Narytiss doesn't realize that instead of being 6' 3" tall, Lindsey's body is now 6' 7" and her 40D bust was now a 44F. Trying to put on some of the clothes that Lindsey had purchased quickly became an exercise in futility that Narytiss couldn't understand. She had seen that everything Lindsey had purchased earlier had fit her even though some of it WAS fairly tight, so she figures that that should still be the case. Lindsey's sub-conscious had found a back door out of Narytiss total mind control. Unfortunately for Lindsey's sake, it would only work when Narytiss was really focused on changing the size and/or shape of Lindsey's body which would not be very often. So until the fleet arrived and Narytiss decides to again become 100 feet or so tall, Lindsey will be going along for the ride.
13122211.title: Narytiss waits for the troops to arrive

choices: Continue from here
Months later
131222111.content:
A few days after her takeover of Lindsey’s body, Narytiss went out into the cloudy night with a strange device cradled in one arm. She went several miles from the town to a field of tall grasses. She set the device down and pushed a button on it before leaping onto a small platform on top of it. Lindsey watched through Narytiss’ eyes as all the grass within six feet of the device was instantly incinerated, she would have screamed if she was able to.
“Yeah, our military engineers never quite grasped the concept of subtlety.” Narytiss said noticing Lindsey’s shock.

Narytiss stepped down from the device and pressed another button on it and a red light started flashing on it. “Don’t worry, it’s not going to explode.” Narytiss said, sensing Lindsey’s apprehension.

Several minutes passed before three beeps came from the device. “Ah, excellent. They’ve got the location.” Narytiss said almost merrily as she turned the device off and picked it up. Several minutes passed by with nothing happening, but then the craft appeared and landed in the cleared area the device made. The ship was about as big as a coffin, but if Lindsey remembered correctly how big Narytiss was when she landed there could be several aliens in it. In fact there were twelve of them, all females like Narytiss and dressed similar to her when she landed, minus the shreds and tears in the suits; they exited the craft and lined up side-by-side in military precision.

“[Welcome to our next conquest ladies.]” Narytiss said in a strange alien language.

“[It is good to be back in action with you Commander.]” one of the aliens replied.

“[Love the new body Commander, a very fine specimen.]” another said.

I probably can understand what they’re saying through Narytiss’ mind… Lindsey thought.

“[Many thanks Sergeant, however, many of this girl’s assets have been improved since I bonded with her. I’m sure you all have read my report.]” Narytiss said.

“[We have. Even the queen herself has taken interest in this.]”

“[An interest? She was ready to come here and try it out herself before we even started.]” The sergeant laughed.

“[Really? But, regardless; this human female and others like her are the key to our offensive on this world. Once the bond is formed, you will need to proceed carefully to seize control of the host and suppress the growth. Only once you have control over the body can you allow the growth to take place. We were assigned this mission because we are the best. We were sent ahead of the troops because we get the results this mission requires. Bond with a female and get control of her body; we’ll meet back here in one month. Remember girls, I expect no less than your best and will accept nothing less.]” Narytiss said.

The twelve aliens saluted and went off towards the town, leaving Narytiss (and Lindsey) in the clearing with the ship. “We’ll hide this back at your place. Can’t leave it lying around where some important might find it.” Narytiss said, returning to speaking English as she effortlessly lifted the ship and started back to town herself.


As Narytiss planned, a month later before the sun rose she and the twelve other aliens met at the landing site. All twelve of the aliens had bonded and taken over the bodies of a woman. “[Excellent work girls. And now the fun begins. Spread out around the town. We’ll meet at the center and clear a zone for the troops to land. And by the way girls, while this may be a serious mission, try to have fun.]” Narytiss said with a mischievous smile.

The twelve girls matched Narytiss’ smile or giggled manically as they walked off.

As the sun started rising the twelve other reported in ready. “I hope you weren’t too fond of this town Lindsey, it’s not going to be around much longer.” Narytiss giggled.

Lindsey didn’t have time to reply as the familiar tingle of growth started. And once again they stood 100 feet tall.

“I’m sure you remember the last time we did this. But this time things will be a bit different.” Narytiss said as she started walking towards the town.


Lindsey experienced every bit of Narytiss’ rampage. She felt every building crushed beneath her bare feet, she tasted every person on her tongue and felt every futile punch or kick of every person trapped in her stomach whenever Narytiss swallowed a helpless human. By midday the town had been leveled and Narytiss met the other twelve at the center of town.

“[This was good. I haven’t had this much fun on a mission since we put down that rebellion on Xakriss IV.]” The sergeant said gleefully as another slurped up a pair of kicking legs into her mouth.

“[We’ll have time to celebrate later. The first transport will be arriving by nightfall. Oolaxyy, Varrysa, Wusyit, and Rimlyix, you four stay with me and clear space for the command center. The rest of you start setting up the landing platforms in the southern half, we’ll join you when we’re done.]” Narytiss ordered.


Narytiss and her crew worked fast. All the rubble was cleared and several large metal platforms for ships were built and all of them shrank back to human height long before the first transport descended from the sky. While the twelve others helped unload and build various command structures, barracks and mess halls, Narytiss was excused by her high rank and retired to a temporary structure for the night.

“We had some fun didn’t we?” Narytiss asked with a giggle.

Lindsey didn’t answer; she was still shocked by all that Narytiss did earlier that day.

Narytiss giggled again. “Well, now that we’ve set up shop, it’s time for your reward.”

Reward? What reward? And what for? Lindsey asked.

“I always like to reward those that help me. Normally it would wealth or power in the regimes we set up on our conquered worlds. But this is a different case, as our two species are so similar, so I have something special in mind.” Narytiss replied.

Special? I don’t like the sound of that. Lindsey said nervously.

Narytiss laughed out loud this time, “You are quite the pessimist. Aren’t you? You remember that I entered into “your” body and it stayed hidden within the ribcage. Well starting tonight it will start transferring to “our” womb. As shall your consciousness.”

What!?!? You mean you’re gonna… Lindsey trailed off.

“Pretty much. Recycling to the max.” Narytiss giggled.
131222111.title: Lindsey is rewarded

choices: Cooperate and contain Lindsey within the original body
Force Lindsey into the womb and attempt to brainwash her into an obedient slave
1312221111.content:
Lindsey thought for a panicked moment. She could not afford to let this alien wretch expel her from her own body. She realized that she needed to figure out a way to stay inside her body, and eventually resist and takeover her giant alien mind’s control of the size controls.

Please don’t kick me out of my body. Allow my conscious to stay in my own body. Lindsey pleaded to the alien mind in her body.

Narytiss yawned to herself. She replied, “Nah, I don’t think that will be possible. Having a second mind in this body causes all of my thoughts to just buzz in the back of your skull.”

The flippant attitude in Narytiss tone caused something in Lindsey to snap. I will break you.

This caught Narytiss’ attention. “What did you say, midget? You think that you will be able to defeat me? How?”

If you shove me into that womb-bound body, and eject me into the world, I will be the bane of your invasion. I will remember every building that you crushed with my feet, every single body that you forced me to consume, and I will strike at your invasion force with the wrath of 100 Amazon warriors. Lindsey pressed forward with her threats, emblazoning them with images of burning wreckage she remembered from every horror flick, news broadcast, and even memories of the crushed city wreckage that she wrought that day. If she could scare Narytiss with a resistant cog to the alien war machine, Lindsey might be able to avoid losing access to her human body.

Narytiss didn't even give her a second thought. “Big talk for someone who doesn't have anything to back it up.” Narytiss hummed to herself, as she began to pull Lindsey’s consciousness towards the husk drifting inside of the giant’s body.

Lindsey screamed one last threat. I would hunt you down and eradicate every giant being that your species possessed. I won’t care if the humans reject me, as long as I make the planet safe for them again. You will never leave this planet, because I will not put you six feet under the dirt, but I will bury my body and your soul under the 100 feet of alien invasion rubble. Lindsey let venom and blood lust seep into her thoughts.

Narytiss froze. What does she do with this rebellious mind?
1312221111.title: Resist her birthing process

choices: Brainwash my host as if she never existed
Restrain her, so she will never control herself again
13122211111.content:
Narytiss froze. She was overcome by a feeling that she had not felt in her for years. Spikes of fear drove themselves slowly up her spine, penetrating the back of her brain. Narytiss could not allow the fall of the planet to fail because of determined resistance from the hybrid slaves that should support the incoming troops.

“In all of our conquests, we have never had a race that was able to turn the hybrid symbiosis against us.”

Lindsey replied with a laugh. If I remember correctly, you also claimed that you never had a species with such an ability to connect with you. What if I take your body and corrupt it into a weapon of resistance? You will find yourselves out manned, in unfamiliar terrain, while we humans will learn to adapt, both to your giants and to the new body weapons that you so generously provided.

Narytiss chuckled to herself. “Well played, Lindsey.” She hoisted herself off her bunk, and walked out of the temporary barracks into the night air. From the view of the moon, it appeared to be closer to midnight than to dawn. She let out a shrieking noise, and the dozen commando troops swarmed out of the darkness and formed ranks in front of her.

[Girls, there has been a development. My generous host just threatened to overtake the invasion force using the body that I previously possessed.] Murmurs arouse from the crowd of assembled aliens.

Wusyit asked [Is this really an issue to be concerned about? My host seems to enjoy the carnage that we brought down upon the indigenous peoples.]

[It appears that these humans might attempt to resist the brainwash re-birthing process; if successful, they could learn how to resist our technology, and develop countermeasures to our ships and weapons.] Narytiss informed her troops.

Oolaxyy, Varrysa, Wusyit, and Rimlyix looked among themselves. The others also shared looks of concern. Finally, Varrysa raised her hand and asked, [What are the options, Commander?]

Narytiss shook her head in what Lindsey realized was amusement. [Two challenging choices stand before you troops. The first option demands a brainwash and rewrite of the memories of the implanted conscious, permitting complete obedience. The second decision will require at least a week of leave to allow for undisturbed mental focus, to cage the conscious of the host, cutting off its ability to take control, to communicate with you, to sense anything outside and inside their own body. This should reduce the buzzing in the mind, while permitting them to keep their bodies.]

Rimlyix demanded [Will the other troops be alerted to the body changes and warned of the brain resistance?]

Narytiss nodded, [As soon as I provide the initial intelligence lectures to the forward troops, I will be taking some time off to ---]
13122211111.title: A cage is worse than death

choices: The brainwashing is successful.
The raw fury of Lindsey's chant allowed her to keep one memory -- Destroy Aliens
13122211112.content:
Narytiss froze. She was overcome by how pathetic an attempt this was to stay in control.

“In all of our conquests, we have never had a race that was able to turn the hybrid symbiosis against us.”

Lindsey replied with a laugh. If I remember correctly, you also claimed that you never had a species with such an ability to connect with you. What if I take your body and corrupt it into a weapon of resistance? You will find yourselves out manned, in unfamiliar terrain, while we humans will learn to adapt, both to your giants and to the new body weapons that you so generously provided.

Narytiss chuckled to herself. “Well played, Lindsey. But that won’t keep you in your body. Now let’s get you settled down in your new home.”

Lindsey felt the draw of the alien power, dragging her, chaining her up within the body of alien origin. Lindsey began to feel again, with a mix of wonder and horror as her new body moved through the uterus wall. Inside, the mucus-filled walls of the endometrium cushioned the body. Lindsey felt the waves of muscle as her new head was slowly rotated toward the cervix, her eventual passage of rebirth. The designs of blood vessels inside the walls hypnotized her; she almost missed Narytiss final remarks.

“Now that you are in my womb, it is time to attach the umbilical cord, and infuse my alien blood with your human ‘DNA’, to create the hybrid warriors needed to defeat this planet. It’s rather painless, except for the shocks delivered to eradicate your memories.”

The touch of the thin cord to her lower chest snapped her out of her bliss. NO, you will not get away with this. I will hunt down your aliens. I will destroy your ships, and your AAH!!!! What the hell was that?! No, got to focus. My name is Lindsey. I will destroy aliens. My name is RAH!!!!! Damn, it was too much. Narrow focus. Destroy Aliens, Destroy Aliens, Destroy Aliens, Destroy Aliens, Destroy Aliens. Lindsey continued to chant her mission, with a fury that burned through Narytiss’ consciousness. Slowly, the umbilical cord gripped the tiny alien body, pumping shocks of energy that battered Lindsey’s consciousness. Her only defense was the chanting that slowly lulled her into a forced coma.
13122211112.title: Take your best shot, fetus

choices: Move to the West Coast, over challenging mountains, to capture San Francisco, CA
Move to the East Coast, with manageable terrain, to seize Norfolk, VA
131222111122.content:
Nearly nine months Lindsey has disappeared from the face of the Earth, and she is about to emerge into the new Hell on Earth. In the time that she has been gone, the invasion forces of the alien species—Earthlings now call them Succumbs—had demolished nearly all of the highly populated metropolitan areas in North America, including the national capitals of Canada and the United States, and most of the strategic military locations. Even domestic missile attacks smashed harmlessly against their shielded space ships, provoking harsh strikes on the launch sites and all nearby populated areas, led by the Super Commander of the Advanced Forces, Narytiss.

Strike forces of alien ground troops are accompanied by the altered human-alien giants. Towering at over 100 feet high, the “Nephilim Spawns” could simply stroll into a city and smash apart buildings and devour all the humans they can, like teenagers raiding the kitchen pantry. When humans were not consumed as food by the Nephilim-classed Succumbs, they were captured and taken to internment camps for two reasons. The first reason was slave labor, mainly consisting of the males, the elderly and children. The second reason was take-over of female victims, in an effort to mass produce Nephilim troops.

After the first month of terror and destruction caused by the “Nephilim Spawns” and the forward troop invasions, the queen of the Succumbs, one Royal Highness Tabitha, had arrived on planet. She allowed for a planetary surrender, at the cost of enslavement of all cooperating human forces and extermination of any and all resistance. All of the other continents banned together, and pulled back all their cargo ships, their transport vessels and their planes, to prevent alien exposure within their own countries.

So far, the embargo succeeded in preventing the crossing of the Succumbs into other countries and continents. Most of the resistance now comes from the more rural areas, or the most hostile and barren environments. Dense forest valleys, ocean islands, frozen mountain ranges, and sweltering desert areas—the areas mankind had deemed too hard to develop—now provide natural deterrents against the forces of the Succumbs—for now. Electronic devices still appear to work, but there is no certainty of communications being overheard or manipulated.

*&*&*

Narytiss walks up to the doors of a hospital building, and groans as another pang of a human contraction rushes through her body. With all of the alien technology at her disposal, she decided to not risk damaging either her Nephilim body or her alien hybrid child, rather seeking out a stable ‘anti-alien’ hospital to extract the hybrid baby. However, as a safety measure, she brought along a restraining collar, capable of stunning even the most aggressive hybrids that her species had produced.

“Help me; I think it’s coming out!” Narytiss cries out, catching the attention of the medical professionals in the lobby. They rushed her into a wheelchair, dashing her off to the maternity wing.

Several hours later, the head appeared between Narytiss’ legs, and the doctor cradled the baby’s head. When the baby opened up its eyes, the lava red orbs caught sight of Narytiss and narrowed down to burning slits. “ALIEN!” the little head screeched. The doctor and all the nurses scrambled away as the baby began to writhe its way out of Narytiss’ womanhood. A pair of bony arms squirmed their way out, and gripped each leg, pulling the rest of its body out of the vaginal passage. It landed on the floor, a mesh of adult sized limbs with sharp red claws, and an infant head and torso. Screeching “ALIEN!” at Narytiss, the infant creature backed towards the hallway, slipping out of sight. Furiously crawling down the hallway, the baby drew screams of terror from nurses, doctors, and orderlies who scrambled out of the way. It leaped at the high ventilation system, smashing through the grate and disappearing into the building, with one last scream of “ALIEN!”

Narytiss, still in the delivery room, heard the screams of terror in the hallway. Sighing to herself, she looked at the petrified doctor and nursing staff still in the room. She asked, “I don’t suppose that we can just pretend that this incident, like, never happened, and I can quietly leave the building?” When they didn’t respond, she groaned as she pulled herself off the medical gurney and stood to her Amazonian height. She towered over the staff, waiting for an answer. When they continued to cower against the wall, she rolled her eyes and began to grow, smashing through the floor and the ceiling.

The hybrid creature had made it out of the building and to the roadway when Super Nephilim Narytiss smashed through the roof of the hospital. Turning to watch, the conscious of Lindsey stirred in the creature, igniting distant remnants of Lindsey’s vow to destroy all the aliens. As the infant watches the painful destruction of these innocents, it gains control of the leg muscles and begins to straggle away from the destruction occurring at Narytiss’ futile attempt to find Lindsey’s new form.

*&*&*

Within a month, rumors had circulated as to the existence of a new alien monster. Some told of the destruction of human hospitals as Nephilim, in human form, infiltrated the hospital to birth the new monstrosity babies; upon delivery, the Nephilim trashed the hospitals and walked away carrying clawed babies. One of the stranger rumors was the Howling Hybrid, which would strike at various human internment camps. The hybrid, which bore red eyes and triangular ears on the side of its head, would attack alien soldiers and tear down the fences, allowing the humans to escape. By the time reinforcements would arrive, the monster would be gone, leaving a pile of dismembered Succumb bodies buried under the shredded structures of the camp. Surviving humans, on both sides of the fighting, claimed that the Howling Hybrid would howl the phrase “Destroy Aliens!” as it tore apart the alien forces.

Narytiss knew what the hybrid was: the reincarnation of Lindsey. However, even with all her tracking skills, Narytiss could never track the creature for very long. Other than the occasional set of tracks with three fingers and a thumb, there was nothing else to go on: no thermal trail, no tufts of fur or scales, and no scent trail. While Narytiss would have loved to track down her prey to the ends of the earth, she had other things to attend to.
131222111122.title: … And the hybrid chose its own destiny.

choices: Resistant cells align with the rogue hybrid.
Humans fear the creature as well as the Nephilim
1312221111222.content:
The Succumbs had been arriving on Earth using high speed ships to cover the light years between their home planet and Earth, and to enter the atmosphere without physical harm. However, the ship designs do not allow for suitable atmospheric battles, making the “Nephilim Spawns” the most suited weapons for land based engagements: all they had to do was swat the planes out of the air. Unfortunately, there were no sea-worthy transports among the alien arsenal. To correct this flaw, the “Nephilim Spawns” had been ordered by Royal Highness Tabitha to procure human military ships and transport vessels.

Suspecting this very strategy, the naval fleets of the United States had evacuated to extreme distances off shore, anticipating long range bombardments from the alien invasion forces. When the Succumbs could not capture any naval ships, they moved their forces towards the Eastern coast port cities. In Norfolk, the aliens met severe resistance.

As a now emptied naval station, the Succumbs deemed that they could possess the facilities to construct alien-enhanced human ships, either from new construction or advancements on cruise ships, which would be big enough for transporting the “Nephilim Spawns” to the other continents. Realizing the alien strategy, human military troops had moved in to try and destroy the construction yards, rendering them worthless.

Between the tanks on the streets, the flamethrowers and explosive charges in the construction buildings, and the single Nephilim Spawn bearing down on the town, all of the citizenship was in chaos. The Nephilim Spawn brought her hand to her mouth and whistled loudly. For a half mile, all the windows in Norfolk either cracked or shattered due to the blast of noise. In the silence that followed, the people waited for the giantess to move, triggering a mass exodus in the opposing direction. However, wolf-like howls broke the silence, as the new forces of the alien invasion made their debut appearance. The Nephilim Spawn stood back, watching as the hybrids began to tear the city to shreds.

The baby hybrids barreled into the city, tearing along the roadways. They leaped over houses, smashed through cars, and slashed at any other obstacles in their paths. Appearing like the werewolves of ancient legends, nearly 2 dozen blue shaggy haired alien creatures began rampaging through the streets. With their long muscular arms and razor-like claws, the 10-foot tall creatures slashed and hacked at anything that moved, from escaping cars to dug-in defense troops. With their agility and minuscule chests, the creatures did not appear to take damage from bullets or grenade explosions. The creatures made swift work of the outer defense lines, and moved towards the ship yards and dock areas.

As the alien’s monster forces approached the storage container shipping yard, the resistance cells and the Army troop forces bolstered up a new line of defense. From the highway, six of the werewolf babies followed the train tracks towards the shipping yard. Another three came from the direction of downtown Norfolk, through the Old Dominion University campus in a rush to reach their master’s goal. The troop forces could see the blood lust in their eyes, and the blood and gore on their muzzles and claws. The outer booby traps, placed hastily to try and deter the monsters, detonated and maimed two of the nine creatures, bringing a frenzied rush towards the gates of the ship yard.

A new roar—with the charisma of a lion—froze both forces in place. Leaping from the highway-bound train tracks, a hybrid creature with the same appearance as the others leaped in between the two forces. Unlike the blue haired creatures, this blond furred beast turned its back to the humans and bared its teeth at its sisters. In a possessed rush, all of the blue beasts jumped the blond one, screeching and extending their claws to shred the newcomer. The two wounded from the defenses leaped at the blond werewolf from the left. The blond stood up to her full height, a towering 20 foot creature, and slapped those two with the back of her front paw. They sailed backward, falling among the booby traps and snares.

Four blue freaks tried to tackle her legs, while the final three used their momentum to climb to her back and neck. The blond she-wolf-creature did not seem disturbed with the creatures climbing all over her. She kicked out at one of the werewolves tangled around her leg, and pinned another two under her front paws. The fourth blue pup drew a fresh red muzzle away from the leg, only to find itself pierced through the chest by the blond creature’s needle sharp teeth. Shaking her head, the blond monster tore apart the chest of its victim, and tossed the twitching body behind her. It landed among the soldiers, where it twitched once more before falling completely still. The two pinned under her paws were decapitated by a flick of razor claws. Sprays of red gushed from the necks as the blond demon rolled their bodies into a pile.

Reaching around to her back, she slashed a leg off of one of the blue mongrels, causing it to fall to the pavement below. The second one was grabbed in her claws. Struggling to reach the final pest in her fur, a growl of frustration turned to a roar of agony as the struggling creature bit down hard into her forepaws, and the final one found skin near the neck to slash.

Up until now, the troops had watched the freak show, not sure how to react. When the creature roared out, a shot rang out from the ranks of troops. “Who shot that?” a captain screamed out. Turning around, the captain noticed a sergeant with the smoking barrel of a sniper rifle. The captain snatched the rifle. “What do you think you are doing?! What if that creature turns on us now?”

“But, sir. Look over there,” the sergeant points over at the behemoth.

The blond creature had shrunk away, but then realized that the pain was gone. Tumbling to the ground, the final blue wolf creature landed with a bone snapping thud. A howl of satisfaction met the troops as she snapped the one in her paw into two chunks of alien meat. Piling up the bodies of her victims, the blond werewolf seemed to count the victims. Looking around, she saw her final prey. The one she had kicked was making a dash for the Norfolk bridges, back into the Old Dominion campus area. To the surprise of the men, the blond creature bounded away chasing the blue deserter, as she screamed out, “Destroy Aliens!”

1312221112.content:
Nearly nine months Lindsey has disappeared from the face of the Earth, and she is about to emerge into the new Hell on Earth. In the time that she has been gone, the invasion forces of the alien species—Earthlings now call them Succumbs—had demolished nearly all of the highly populated metropolitan areas in North America, including the national capitals of Canada and the United States, and most of the strategic military locations. Even domestic missile attacks smashed harmlessly against their shielded space ships, provoking harsh strikes on the launch sites and all nearby populated areas, led by the Super Commander of the Advanced Forces, Narytiss.

Strike forces of alien ground troops are accompanied by the altered human-alien giants. Towering at over 100 feet high, the “Nephilim Spawns” could simply stroll into a city and smash apart buildings and devour all the humans they can like teenagers raiding the kitchen pantry. When humans were not consumed as food by the Nephilim-classed Succumbs, they were captured and taken to internment camps for two reasons. The first reason was slave labor, mainly consisting of the males, the elderly and children. The second reason was take-over of female victims, in an effort to mass produce Nephilim troops.

After the first month of terror and destruction caused by the “Nephilim Spawns” and the forward troop invasions, the queen of the Succumbs, one Royal Highness Tabitha, had arrived on planet. She allowed for a planetary surrender, at the cost of enslavement of all cooperating human forces and extermination of any and all resistance. All of the other continents banned together, and pulled back all their cargo ships, their transport vessels and their planes, to prevent alien exposure within their own countries.

So far, the embargo succeeded in preventing the crossing of the Succumbs into other countries and continents. Most of the resistance now comes from the more rural areas, or the most hostile and barren environments. Dense forest valleys, ocean islands, frozen mountain ranges, and sweltering desert areas—the areas mankind had deemed too hard to develop—now provide natural deterrents against the forces of the Succumbs—for now. Electronic devices still appear to work, but there is no certainty of communications being overheard or manipulated.

*&*&*

Narytiss walks up to the doors of a hospital building, and groans as another pang of a human contraction rushes through her body. With all of the alien technology at her disposal, she decided to not risk damaging either her Nephilim body or her alien hybrid child, rather seeking out a stable ‘anti-alien’ hospital to extract the hybrid baby. However, as a safety measure, she brought along a restraining collar, capable of stunning even the most aggressive hybrids that her species had produced.

“Help me; I think it’s coming out!” Narytiss cries out, catching the attention of the medical professionals in the lobby. They rushed her into a wheelchair, dashing her off to the maternity wing.

Several hours later, the head appeared between Narytiss’ legs, and the doctor cradled the baby’s head. When the baby opened up its eyes, the lava red orbs caught sight of Narytiss and narrowed down to burning slits. “ALIEN!” the little head screeched. The doctor and all the nurses scrambled away as the baby began to writhe its way out of Narytiss’ womanhood. A pair of bony arms squirmed their way out, and gripped each leg, pulling the rest of its body out of the vaginal passage. It landed on the floor, a mesh of adult sized limbs with sharp red claws, and an infant head and torso. Screeching “ALIEN!” at Narytiss, the infant creature backed towards the hallway, slipping out of sight. Furiously crawling down the hallway, the baby drew screams of terror from nurses, doctors, and orderlies who scrambled out of the way. It leaped at the high ventilation system, smashing through the grate and disappearing into the building, with one last scream of “ALIEN!”

Narytiss, still in the delivery room, heard the screams of terror in the hallway. Sighing to herself, she looked at the petrified doctor and nursing staff still in the room. She asked, “I don’t suppose that we can just pretend that this incident, like, never happened, and I can quietly leave the building?” When they didn’t respond, she groaned as she pulled herself off the medical gurney and stood to her Amazonian height. She towered over the staff, waiting for an answer. When they continued to cower against the wall, she rolled her eyes and began to grow, smashing through the floor and the ceiling.

The hybrid creature had made it out of the building and to the roadway when Super Nephilim Narytiss smashed through the roof of the hospital. Turning to watch, the conscious of Lindsey stirred in the creature, igniting distant remnants of Lindsey’s vow to destroy all the aliens. As the infant watches the painful destruction of these innocents, it gains control of the leg muscles and begins to straggle away from the destruction occurring at Narytiss’ futile attempt to find Lindsey’s new form.

*&*&*

Within a month, rumors had circulated as to the existence of a new alien monster. Some told of the destruction of human hospitals as Nephilim, in human form, infiltrated the hospital to birth the new monstrosity babies; upon delivery, the Nephilim trashed the hospitals and walked away carrying clawed babies. One of the stranger rumors was the Howling Hybrid, which would strike at various human internment camps. The hybrid, which bore red eyes and triangular ears on the side of its head, would attack alien soldiers and tear down the fences, allowing the humans to escape. By the time reinforcements would arrive, the monster would be gone, leaving a pile of dismembered Succumb bodies buried under the shredded structures of the camp. Surviving humans, on both sides of the fighting, claimed that the Howling Hybrid would howl the phrase “Destroy Aliens!” as it tore apart the alien forces.

Narytiss knew what the hybrid was: the reincarnation of Lindsey. However, even with all her tracking skills, Narytiss could never track the creature for very long. Other than the occasional set of tracks with three fingers and a thumb, there was nothing else to go on: no thermal trail, no tufts of fur or scales, and no scent trail. While Narytiss would have loved to track down her prey to the ends of the earth, she had other things to attend to.

In a matter of weeks, many of the Midwestern states started to rebel against the infestation of the Succumb internment camps. Various resistant cells were formed from the released prisoners. These cells banded to hunt the small Succumbs; when a bigger Nephilim appeared, the cell warriors would scatter like leaves to the four winds, forcing the giant to chase only a small group.

With all of the set-backs in the central part of the continent, Royal Highness Tabitha started to demand more expansion results from her troops. Deterred by the mammoth mountains of the West Coast and the desolate desert regions of Central America, the alien forces made mass approaches to the Eastern Coast. Several cities fell, including Norfolk, Boston, and New Orleans. Sea based missile attacks, as well as sabotage performed by resistant citizen groups and military troops was able to disable many ports. Unfortunately, the Succumbs caught on to the pattern, and sent a squad of Nephilim to Miami to secure the city and ports. Narytiss volunteered to lead the squad.

*&*&*

Between the tanks on the streets, the flamethrowers in the construction buildings, and the half-dozen giantess marching towards the river, the city was in total chaos, and most of the citizens had fled. One of the smaller giantesses was approaching a squad of tanks when she was attacked from behind. Falling down to the ground on her knees, the giantess shook its arms while screaming and grabbing for her back. The tanks let loose a barrage of shells, torching the giantess’ front side. Dazed into unconsciousness, the giant let her arms lull to her side. She collapsed face-down to the concrete, producing a tremor upon impact.

Through the smoke and debris clouds, the soldiers in the tanks noticed a creature rise up from the back of the giant. With a wolf snout and long orangutan arms, the monster raised a three-finger hand high up above his head and brought it down. A gleam of daggers flashed; blood sprouted from the giant’s back, reaching the strength of a geyser. A howl of approval came from the beast. It leaped at a building, and smashed through the glass window, disappearing into the 10th floor of an office building.

One of the soldiers asked, “What was that thing?”

The tank leader replied, “I don’t know what it was; but it wasn’t interested in us. Come on. We better leave this giantess alone; otherwise, the others will think that we did this to it.”

The tanks back away from the fallen and dying giantess, and went to support another unit trying to destroy the cruise ship marinas.

*&*&*

With the sudden appearance of the ‘long slashing wolf’ creature, the tide of battle began to shift to the humans. The smoke-furred monster would smash out of buildings, and surprise the giants. Darting around in the smoke and flames, the creature slashed at the ankles of the giants or scratch up the alien backs. Whenever the humans worked in tandem with the appearance of the monster, the giants suffered even more damage, from the burning shells and machine gun blasts to the wolf needle teeth and dagger claws. When a giantess actually fell, the wolf monster would move for a kill blow on the back of the neck.

Soon the alien forces dwindled down to a few small altered troop transports carrying Succumbs foot soldiers, meant to seize the port buildings, and the last standing Nephilim, Narytiss. With most of the docks and port areas in either smoldering cinders or ruby flames, the army forces had reformed a moving barricade, pushing the last bits of resistance towards the everglades in the west. Between the tanks barging up the streets, the modified Succumb troop transports scurried away like bugs. Even Narytiss felt forced back. Tank shells smashed around the buildings that she was using for her cover and mortar fire formed debris clouds at her feet. She could not understand how the humans could be so organized and destructive enough to beat her Nephilim troops.

A roar and howl reached the ears of everyone within the battlefield. “DESTROY ALIENS!! DESTROY ALIENS!!” Looking up to the roof of a high-rise, both battle forces witnessed the gray-furred monstrosity glaring down at Narytiss. “ALIEN BETRAYER! BODY SNATCHER!! TIME TO DIE!”

“It’s the Howling Hybrid! Where did it come from?” One tank commander shouted out.

“That’s the Long Slashing Wolf that killed the Giantess on 8th Street. It jumped on her back, freaking the giantess out. When we shelled her front, she fell and the creature dealt a kill blow.” This came from a tank gunner, who had witnessed her earlier during the siege. “She ignored us completely, just jumping into a building and disappearing.”

Another trooper radioed, “We were helped by Smoky too. The crafty devil slashed at a Giantess’ ankles in the Pinecrest suburbs. Dagger claws it had; why, it even tore up one of the Succumb trucks with its bare paws. Seemed to be ignoring us too.”
Narytiss, on the other hand, was not relieved by the site of her flesh and mixed blood. “ALL Succumbs, forget the humans. Focus all fire on that Hybrid Warrior. Destroy it at all costs!!” With that announcement, she turned her focus off the wolf monster. She instructed, “Keep it away from me. I will destroy the tanks.”

How do the tanks respond?

1513312.content:
From her hiding place Lindsey watched as the silhouette of something humanoid steps out of the ship. Heavy footsteps lightly shook the ground as the thirty-something foot tall being walked out of the ship and looked around her back yard. She peeked out a little farther from the tree to get a good look at the otherworldly invader.

It was a woman. Her hair was red, short, and spikey. Her crimson eyes scanned the area with a fiery glare, like she was looking to pick a fight. Her body was wearing what appeared to be a type of armor...but Lindsey doubted it could block much. It had a long breastplate and shoulder plates, but the only thing covering her muscular thighs were a pair of spandex shorts. Plus, nothing was covering her tail...a tail?!

That was when she realized this woman's outfit was the same as someone from that old Dragon Ball cartoon she watched as a kid. But this was reality. If this woman was a saiyan like the cartoon, it would mean the end of the earth. They were supposed to be a violent race of warriors that conquer other worlds for the sheer love of combat.

For the first time, the giantess spoke.
"This is Rita, checking in. I've landed on the designated world, but there has been no response. I'll continue surveying for signs of sentient life."
"Affirmative. If there are no signs of intelligence, continue your mission for resource extraction. If you come across any hostile lifeforms, you are approved to dispose of them."
"Understood." She seemed to hang up her earpiece before making a long sigh. "There's no way this rock has any sentients. Will they figure it out if I just blast this rock into nothingness?"

A cold chill ran down Lindsey's spine. She really will destroy the Earth! Unless...

"P-please wait!" she called out. The Saiyan's head snapped down at the source of sound, instantly locking eyes with the human.

How does the giant woman act?
